languages.text: "Могучий Эксплораторский флот, изучающий Простор не первое столетие, внезапно перестал отвечать на сообщения и погрузился в спор вокруг техноереси, почитавшейся мертвой уже пару веков. Династия Чорда всерьез взялась за мятежников — но своими жестокими действиями плодит бунтарей с той же скоростью, с которой казнит, и эта кровавая карусель полностью поглощает внимание почтенной Инцендии. Каллигос Винтерскейл внезапно утратил интерес к своим владениям и, кажется, интересуется лишь тем, как прикончить новую ксенотварь поопаснее".

traits.locale_text: "Или о том, что две стаи Космических Волков, — благословенных космодесантников, призванных моим именем — вот уже несколько десятилетий ведут на них кровавую охоту в дальних регионах Простора? Или о том, что могучий флот Эксплораторов, помощь которой так пригодилась бы нам, перестал отвечать на сообщения и погрузился в спор вокруг техноереси, почитавшейся мертвой уже пару веков? Я о многом мог бы рассказать, но, боюсь, у вас нет допуска к этой информации, {name}".

languages.text: "A mighty Explorator Fleet, which has studied the Expanse for hundreds of years, has suddenly stopped responding to communication and sunk into a dispute over a tech-heresy that was considered dead a couple of centuries ago. House Chorda has clamped down on insurgents, yet its acts of brutality breed troublemakers just as quickly as they're executed, and this bloody carousel has consumed the attention of the esteemed Incendia. Calligos Winterscale has abruptly lost all interest in his domain, and his only apparent concern now is hunting ever more dangerous xenobeasts."
languages.original_text: "Могучий Эксплораторский флот, изучающий Простор не первое столетие, внезапно перестал отвечать на сообщения и погрузился в спор вокруг техноереси, почитавшейся мертвой уже пару веков. Династия Чорда всерьез взялась за мятежников — но своими жестокими действиями плодит бунтарей с той же скоростью, с которой казнит, и эта кровавая карусель полностью поглощает внимание почтенной Инцендии. traits.locale_text: "A mighty Explorator Fleet, who has studied the Expanse for hundreds of years, has suddenly stopped responding to communication and sunk into a dispute over a tech-heresy that was considered dead for a couple of centuries. House Chorda has clamped down on insurgents, yet its acts of brutality breed troublemakers just as quickly as they're executed, and this bloody roundabout has consumed the attention of the esteemed Incendia. Calligos Winterscale has abruptly lost all interest in his domain, and his only apparent concern now is hunting ever more dangerous xeno-beasts."

languages.text: 「屈強な探査艦隊は何百年間もエクスパンスの調査をしてきたが、突如通信が途絶え、2世紀前に死んだと考えられていた技術異端の紛争で手一杯になっている。チョーダ家が反乱者を取り締まっているが、残虐な振る舞いが原因で、処刑をすればすぐにトラブルメーカーが生まれる有様だ。まるで血塗れの回転木馬のような連鎖がインセンディアの気を引いている。カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは突然、自分の領地に対する関心を一切失い、ますます危険な異界生物の狩りにしか興味を示さないという」
languages.original_text: "A mighty Explorator Fleet, which has studied the Expanse for hundreds of years, has suddenly stopped responding to communication and sunk into a dispute over a tech-heresy that was considered dead a couple of centuries ago. House Chorda has clamped down on insurgents, yet its acts of brutality breed troublemakers just as quickly as they're executed, and this bloody carousel has consumed the attention of the esteemed Incendia. Calligos Winterscale has abruptly lost all interest in his domain, and his only apparent concern now is hunting ever more dangerous xenobeasts."

traits.locale_text: 「屈強な探査艦隊は何百年間もエクスパンスの調査をしてきたが、突如通信が途絶え、2世紀前に死んだと考えられていた技術異端の紛争で手一杯になっている。チョーダ家が反乱者を取り締まっているが、残虐な振る舞いが原因で、処刑をすればすぐにトラブルメーカーが生まれる有様だ。まるで血塗れの回転木馬のような連鎖がインセンディアの気を引いている。カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは突然、自分の領地に対する関心を一切失い、ますます危険な異界生物の狩りにしか興味を示さないという」

languages.original_text: "A mighty Explorator Fleet, which has studied the Expanse for hundreds of years, has suddenly stopped responding to communication and sunk into a dispute over a tech-heresy that was considered dead a couple of centuries ago. House Chorda has clamped down on insurgents, yet its acts of brutality breed troublemakers just as quickly as they're executed, and this bloody carousel has consumed the attention of the esteemed Incendia. Calligos Winterscale has abruptly lost all interest in his domain, and his only apparent concern now is hunting ever more dangerous xenobeasts."

languages.text: “某支强大的开拓者舰队在过去的几百年里一直都在研究科罗努斯扩区，可最近，他们突然中断了通讯回应，陷入了技术异端的争论之中，而这种异端邪说本该在几百年前就已经覆灭才对。库尔达家族剿灭了叛乱分子，但其血腥的镇压方式激起了更大的不满。新的叛乱一波未平，一波又起，而这血腥的处刑轮舞已经引起了尊贵的因森蒂娅的注意。卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔则突然对他的领土失去了兴趣，一门心思追捕越来越危险的异兽。”
languages.original_text: "A mighty Explorator Fleet, which has studied the Expanse for hundreds of years, has suddenly stopped responding to communication and sunk into a dispute over a tech-heresy that was considered dead a couple of centuries ago. House Chorda has clamped down on insurgents, yet its acts of brutality breed troublemakers just as quickly as they're executed, and this bloody carousel has consumed the attention of the esteemed Incendia. Calligos Winterscale has abruptly lost all interest in his domain, and his only apparent concern now is hunting ever more dangerous xenobeasts."

traits.locale_text: “某支强大的开拓者舰队在过去的几百年里一直都在研究科罗努斯扩区，可最近，他们突然中断了通讯回应，陷入了技术异端的争论之中，而这种异端邪说本该在几百年前就已经覆灭才对。库尔达家族剿灭了叛乱分子，但其血腥的镇压方式激起了更大的不满。新的叛乱一波未平，一波又起，而这血腥的处刑轮舞已经引起了尊贵的因森蒂娅的注意。卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔则突然对他的领土失去了兴趣，一门心思追捕越来越危险的异兽。”

languages.text: «Una poderosa flota exploradora que lleva estudiando la Extensión durante siglos de pronto ha dejado de responder a toda clase de mensajes y se ha sumido en una disputa sobre una tecnoherejía que se creía eliminada hace ya doscientos años. La casa Chorda está haciendo frente a los insurgentes, pero la brutalidad con la que lo hace produce rebeldes al mismo ritmo al que los ejecuta y este sangriento tentetieso ocupa toda la atención de la estimada Incendia. Calligos Winterscale ha perdido todo interés por sus dominios y parece que lo único que le importa ahora es cazar xenobestias cada vez más peligrosas».
languages.original_text: "A mighty Explorator Fleet, which has studied the Expanse for hundreds of years, has suddenly stopped responding to communication and sunk into a dispute over a tech-heresy that was considered dead a couple of centuries ago. House Chorda has clamped down on insurgents, yet its acts of brutality breed troublemakers just as quickly as they're executed, and this bloody carousel has consumed the attention of the esteemed Incendia. Calligos Winterscale has abruptly lost all interest in his domain, and his only apparent concern now is hunting ever more dangerous xenobeasts."

traits.locale_text: «Una poderosa flota exploradora que lleva estudiando la Extensión durante siglos de pronto ha dejado de responder a toda clase de mensajes y se ha sumido en una disputa sobre una tecnoherejía que se creía eliminada hace ya doscientos años. La casa Chorda está haciendo frente a los insurgentes, pero la brutalidad con la que lo hace produce rebeldes al mismo ritmo al que los ejecuta y este sangriento tentetieso ocupa toda la atención de la estimada Incendia. Calligos Winterscale ha perdido todo interés por sus dominios y parece que lo único que le importa ahora es cazar xenobestias cada vez más peligrosas».

languages.text: « Une puissante Flotte Explorator qui étudie les Étendues depuis des siècles a soudain rompu toute communication et s'est enlisée dans un conflit pour le contrôle d'une technohérésie censée avoir disparu depuis plus de deux cents ans. La brutalité dont fait preuve la maison Chorda dans sa chasse aux insurgés fait naître plus de rebelles qu'elle ne parvient à en exécuter, et ce cercle vicieux semble consumer toute l'attention de l'honorable Incendia. Calligos Winterscale a brusquement perdu tout intérêt pour son domaine et se concentre sur la traque de xénobêtes toujours plus dangereuses. »
languages.original_text: "A mighty Explorator Fleet, which has studied the Expanse for hundreds of years, has suddenly stopped responding to communication and sunk into a dispute over a tech-heresy that was considered dead a couple of centuries ago. House Chorda has clamped down on insurgents, yet its acts of brutality breed troublemakers just as quickly as they're executed, and this bloody carousel has consumed the attention of the esteemed Incendia. Calligos Winterscale has abruptly lost all interest in his domain, and his only apparent concern now is hunting ever more dangerous xenobeasts."

traits.locale_text: « Une puissante Flotte Explorator qui étudie les Étendues depuis des siècles a soudain rompu toute communication et s'est enlisée dans un conflit pour le contrôle d'une technohérésie censée avoir disparu depuis plus de deux cents ans. La brutalité dont fait preuve la maison Chorda dans sa chasse aux insurgés fait naître plus de rebelles qu'elle ne parvient à en exécuter, et ce cercle vicieux semble consumer toute l'attention de l'honorable Incendia. Calligos Winterscale a brusquement perdu tout intérêt pour son domaine et se concentre sur la traque de xénobêtes toujours plus dangereuses. »

languages.text: "Eine gewaltige Exploratorflotte, die die Ausdehnung seit Jahrhunderten studiert, reagiert plötzlich nicht mehr auf Kontaktaufnahmen und ist mit einem Disput über eine Tech-Ketzerei befasst, die eigentlich seit mehreren Jahrhunderten als tot galt. Das Haus Chorda ist gegen Aufständische vorgegangen, doch seine brutalen Aktionen bringen Unruhestifter ebenso schnell hervor, wie sie verschwinden, und dieses blutige Karussell bindet die ganze Aufmerksamkeit der geschätzten Incendia. Calligos Winterzunder hat plötzlich sein Interesse am eigenen Reich komplett verloren, und sein einziges Bestreben ist nun die Jagd auf immer gefährlichere Xenobestien."
languages.original_text: "A mighty Explorator Fleet, which has studied the Expanse for hundreds of years, has suddenly stopped responding to communication and sunk into a dispute over a tech-heresy that was considered dead a couple of centuries ago. House Chorda has clamped down on insurgents, yet its acts of brutality breed troublemakers just as quickly as they're executed, and this bloody carousel has consumed the attention of the esteemed Incendia. Calligos Winterscale has abruptly lost all interest in his domain, and his only apparent concern now is hunting ever more dangerous xenobeasts."

traits.locale_text: "Eine gewaltige Exploratorflotte, die die Ausdehnung seit Jahrhunderten studiert, reagiert plötzlich nicht mehr auf Kontaktaufnahmen und ist mit einem Disput über eine Tech-Ketzerei befasst, die eigentlich seit mehreren Jahrhunderten als tot galt. Das Haus Chorda ist gegen Aufständische vorgegangen, doch seine brutalen Aktionen bringen Unruhestifter ebenso schnell hervor, wie sie verschwinden, und dieses blutige Karussell bindet die ganze Aufmerksamkeit der geschätzten Incendia. Calligos Winterzunder hat plötzlich sein Interesse am eigenen Reich komplett verloren, und sein einziges Bestreben ist nun die Jagd auf immer gefährlichere Xenobestien."

languages.text: "Binlerce yıldır Enginlik'i inceleyen kudretli bir Keşiftör Filosu, bir anda iletişim taleplerine yanıt vermeyi kesti ve birkaç asır önce ölüp gittiği sanılan bir tekno kâfirlik çatışmasının içine düştü. Chorda Hanesi isyanlara göz açtırmıyor ancak vahşice yöntemleri, sorun yaratan kişiler idam edilir edilmez yerlerini yenilerinin almasına neden oluyor. Bu kanlı döngü de saygıdeğer İncendia'nın başka şeylere yoğunlaşabilmesine engel oluyor. Calligos Winterscale, birdenbire kendi diyarına olan tüm ilgisini kaybetti. Görünen o ki artık tek derdi, en tehlikeli zenohayvanları avlamak."
languages.original_text: "A mighty Explorator Fleet, which has studied the Expanse for hundreds of years, has suddenly stopped responding to communication and sunk into a dispute over a tech-heresy that was considered dead a couple of centuries ago. House Chorda has clamped down on insurgents, yet its acts of brutality breed troublemakers just as quickly as they're executed, and this bloody carousel has consumed the attention of the esteemed Incendia. Calligos Winterscale has abruptly lost all interest in his domain, and his only apparent concern now is hunting ever more dangerous xenobeasts."

traits.locale_text: "Enginlik üzerinde yüzlerce yıldır çalışan kudretli bir Keşiftör Filosu bir anda iletişim taleplerine yanıt vermeyi kesti ve kendisini iki yüzyıl önce öldüğü düşünülen tekno kâfirlik üzerine bir çatışmanın içinde buldu. Chorda Hanesi isyanlara göz açtırmıyor ancak vahşice yöntemleri, sorun yaratan kişiler idam edildikçe yerlerini yenilerinin almasına neden oluyor ve bu kanlı döngü saygıdeğer İncendia'nın başka bir şeye yoğunlaşamamasına sebep oluyor. Calligos Winterscale birdenbire diyarına olan tüm ilgisini kaybetti ve görünen o ki artık yalnızca bulabildiği en tehlikeli zenohayvanları avlamakla ilgileniyor."
